sentence.Network_en: All the doors have been bricked up to deter vandals.
sentence.Network_cn: 所有的门都用砖堵了起来，防止破坏分子闯入。

sentence.Network_en: Such a statement was hardly calculated to deter future immigrants.
sentence.Network_cn: 这样的声明不太可能吓住将来的移民。

sentence.Network_en: Arming the police doesn't deter crime.
sentence.Network_cn: 仅仅靠给警察配备武器是无法制止犯罪的。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 词根联想记忆法词汇教程(三)|联想记忆法背单词 ... detect v. 探测，发觉 deter v. 阻止，威慑 determination n. 决心，决定.
英语反义词 - 豆丁网 ... desecrate 鄙视>使神圣/尊敬 deter 制止>激励 diabolic 恶魔(一样) 的>慈善的.
俞敏洪单词串讲 - annjining的日志 - 网易博客 ... desirable 可行的,可取的 deter 威慑 deteriorate 恶化.
detect 发现deter 防止detract 减损,责难

list.abs: OECD中国专项研究词汇表_北大CAT... ... deterrent effect of 威慑 deterring effect 威慑效果 develop a foothold 占有一席之地.
司法审核　judicial review司法损害　judicial determents司法体制　judicial structure
阅读记单词_范亚飞_新浪博客 ... deter: 阻止|防止|制止/害怕 deter from: 使不做 deter overawe: 威慑.
BBC新闻讲... ... accountable for 对...应付责任 deter from 阻止某人做某事 She will give up this journey. 她将放弃这次旅行。.
于总统选举中落败lost the presidency阻止贿选deter corruption前台湾省省长宋楚瑜former Taiwan governor James Soong Chu-yu.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from Latin deterrere, from de- 'away from' + terrere 'frighten'

entry.def: To deter someone from doing something means to make them not want to do it or continue doing it.

example.ex: Supporters of the death penalty argue that it would deter criminals from carrying guns...
example.tran: 死刑的支持者认为它能阻吓罪犯携带枪支。

example.ex: Arrests and jail sentences have done nothing to deter the protesters...
example.tran: 逮捕和监禁都没能吓倒抗议者。

means.word_mean: 1. try to prevent; show opposition to;

sentences.sentence: "We should discourage this practice among our youth"

auth_sentence.content: How we do that cannot deter economic growth.
auth_sentence.res_content: How we do that cannot deter economic growth.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: How we do that cannot deter economic growth.

auth_sentence.content: Don't let somewhat older age deter initiating parenthood.
auth_sentence.res_content: Don't let somewhat older age deter initiating parenthood.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Don't let somewhat older age deter initiating parenthood.

auth_sentence.content: But that oversight should not deter would-be viewers.
auth_sentence.res_content: But that oversight should not deter would-be viewers.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But that oversight should not deter would-be viewers.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =earth,表示"土地"; 2. =frighten,可怕,恐惧; 3. =frighten,表示"恐,怕"

stems_affixes.value_cn: [comeing from]地球外的, 宇宙的[outside the earth]
stems_affixes.word_buile: extra外+terrestrial[adj.地球的，地球上的]→adj.[comeing from]地球外的, 宇宙的[outside the earth]
mediterranean而来→n.地中海 adj.地中海的
subterrane[n.下层; 洞穴, 地下室]+ean→adj.地下的
terr土地+estrial→adj.地球的，地球上的
territory[n.领土;版图;领域,范围]+ial……的→territorial领土的
deter[v.威慑,吓住]+ent……的→deterrent威慑的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 很糟的;可怕的,骇人的;极度的,厉害的
stems_affixes.word_buile: terr恐,怕+ible可..的→可怕的
terr恐,怕+ific产生……的→带来可怕→好到让人可怕的地步→极好的
extra外+territorial[adj.领土的,土地的,地方的]+ity表名词→n.治外法权
mediterranean而来→n.地中海 adj.地中海的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 下层; 洞穴, 地下室
stems_affixes.word_buile: sub下面+terr土地+ane→n.下层; 洞穴, 地下室
terr土地+ace→n.平台,阳台,露台
terr土地+ain表名词→n.地势,地形
terr土地+it+ory场所,范围→地的范围,领土
deter[v.威慑,吓住]+ment表名词→n.制止

stems_affixes.value_cn: 恐怖, 可怕的人, 恐怖时期, 恐怖行动
stems_affixes.word_buile: terr恐,怕+or表名词→n.恐怖, 可怕的人, 恐怖时期, 恐怖行动
terror恐怖+ist人→n.恐怖分子
dis离,出+inter埋→v.挖出,掘土
in进+ter=terr土地→v.埋葬
de去+ter=terr恐,怕→吓跑了,吓得不动了
terr恐,怕+ify使……→v.使害怕,使惊恐
